display_long_description:
Enter the ultimate VR Fighting Arena and experience hand-to-hand combat like never before. This game brings classic fighting gameplay—similar to arcade legends—directly into VR with smooth joystick controls, combo buttons, and responsive character movement. Punch, kick, block, dodge, and chain powerful attacks as you face enemies in dynamic arena battles.

Master a variety of martial-arts techniques and fight against unique fighters, each with their own style and challenge. Whether you’re landing heavy strikes, timing perfect counters, or executing special combos, every move feels immersive and satisfying in VR.

Choose your fighter, train your skills, and rise through intense stages to prove yourself as the champion. Perfect for fans of VR combat, martial-arts games, and action-packed fighting experiences.
